divs: Sighting DetailsGreen orb shot out of the sky way too fast to be manmade. after about 3 secs it disappeared.it just disintegrated. it is also crystal clear skys. i grew up here and i can recognize different types of aircrafts. my friend also witnessed the same thing!
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Chesapeake
There were no other sightings in Chesapeake on or around February 27th 2013
Summary: GREEN ORB SHOOTING OUT OF NOWHERE
